action.action-desc: Mr. Brown (for himself, Mr. Sanders, and Mr. Merkley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify authorities relating to the collective bargaining of employees in the Veterans Health Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Department of Veterans Affairs Employee Fairness Act of 2015.

section.header: Modification of authorities on collective bargaining of employees of the Veterans Health Administration
